channel.title: 718/742 Webclient Issue
channel.description:
Hello, everyone. I am sort of new, and would appreciate some help from some of the well-knowledged people in the community.
So, I am trying to create a webclient for Rune-Evolution 718/742 (base is Matrix). When I jar the client, people can use it. But, when me, or someone else tries to use the webclient, I get a connection error. I'm portforwarded (obviously), I'm using the proper IP, and my server's on. This is the code I'm using:
[code]<center> <applet name="Webclient" width="100%" height="100%" archive="MyJarLinkWasHere" code="Loader.class"> <param name="java_arguments" value="-Xmx1024m"/> </applet></center> [/code]
Please post below if you need any more info.

item.title: 718/742 Webclient Issue
item.dc:creator: @deathbysniper97 deathbysniper97
item.description:
@deathbysniper97 wrote:

Most likely you have to change the ip of your client, re compile, re jar/sign, and then publish

Read full topic

item.title: 718/742 Webclient Issue
item.dc:creator: @Chimerica Chimerica
item.description:
@Chimerica wrote:

Your best bet is to contact whoever released the server, or someone who has had the same issue, and have fixed it. I’ve never dealt with Rune-Evolution 742, sorry.

Read full topic
